apps.tree
Class BinaryTreeDriver

java.lang.Object
  apps.tree.BinaryTreeDriver

public class BinaryTreeDriver
extends java.lang.Object

This is a driver for the BinaryTree class.

Author:
Sesh Venugopal

getAction

static BinaryTreeDriver.Action getAction()
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Gets the next action issued at the terminal.

Returns:
Action issued at terminal. If three incorrect attempts are made, returns quit.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is an error in reading the action.

                 throws java.io.IOException
Sets root data for the myTree instance.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is an error in reading the data.
TreeViolationException - If the root already has data.

            throws java.io.IOException

attach

static void attach()
            throws java.io.IOException
Attaches newTree to myTree.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is an error in reading from terminal.
TreeViolationException - If myTree already has a child on the side where attachment is attempted.

preorder

static void preorder(BinaryTree<java.lang.String> root)
Performs a preorder traversal of a given binary tree, and prints data stored at each node.

Parameters:
root - Root of the binary tree that is to be traversed.

inorder

static void inorder(BinaryTree<java.lang.String> root)
Performs an inorder traversal of a given binary tree, and prints data stored at each node.

Parameters:
root - Root of the binary tree that is to be traversed.

inorder

static void inorder(BinaryTree<java.lang.String> tree,
                    Visitor<java.lang.String> visitor)
Performs a non-recursive inorder traversal of a given binary tree. When a node is visited, calls the visit method of the Visitor instance, to take client-specific action at that node.

Parameters:
tree - Root of the binary tree that is to be traversed
visitor - Visitor whose visit method that will be called

postorder

static void postorder(BinaryTree<java.lang.String> root)
Performs a postorder traversal of a given binary tree, and prints data stored at each node.

Parameters:
root - Root of the binary tree that is to be traversed.

buildTree

static BinaryTree<java.lang.String> buildTree(java.lang.String[] pre,
                                              int i,
                                              java.lang.String[] in,
                                              int lo,
                                              int hi)
Recursively builds a binary tree from signature

Parameters:
pre - Preorder traversal array.
i - Current index into preorder traversal.
in - Inorder traversal array.
lo - Current start of inorder traversal array.
hi - Current end of inorder traversal array.
Returns:
Binary tree constructed.
